name: AGDunGeon
description:
This is my entry for the AGDG Zelda Jam. I took inspiration from the 2D Zelda fames, mainly the first one, but with things taken from the later ones as well.

It's pretty much just one crappy dungeon with a boss battle at the end, but I had a ton of fun making this, so I hope you'll enjoy playing it just as much.

It's a classic good vs evil plot, but I think (hope) you will be able to immerse in this game and self instert as the protagonist mech.
